title: onOne Perfect Photo Suite Premium 8.5 Mac (64 bit) [ChingLiu]
description:

You'll have all that you need to enhance, retouch and stylize images, replace backgrounds, and create high quality enlargements.

What's New in Perfect Photo Suite 8

* New Browse Module
* New Enhance Module
* New Batch Module
* Major Update to Perfect Effects
- Over 20 new and and updated adjustable filters
- FocalPoint has been merged with Perfect Effects as the new Lens Blur filter
* Multiple file support in Perfect Layers
* New Perfect Eraser tool
* Overhauled Masking Bug tool

What's New in Perfect Photo Suite 8.5

- Faster thumbnail and preview extraction from Raw files in Browse
- Basic file management tasks can now be accomplished in Browse.
- Drag and Drop for copy and move
- Copy and paste
- Delete files
- Rename files
- Create and name folders
- Zoom to 100% in detail view in Browse
- Multiple, re-editable Masking Bugs
- Perfect Eraser now performs better in areas of low detail like skies

Minimum System Requirements

- Mac OSX 10.7, 10.8, 10.9 (64 bit only, current maintenance releases)
- Intel Core 2 Duo, Xeon or better processor(s)
- 8GB RAM
- 1GB Hard Disc Space
- OpenGL 2.0 capable video card with 256 MB dedicated VRAM, 1280x720 or higher
- Internet connection for activation, auto updates and video tutorials
- DVD drive for installation from disk
- Administrator privileges to install and uninstall

Optional Integration
- Adobe Photoshop CS5, CS6, CC
- Adobe Photoshop Elements 10, 11, 12
- Adobe Photoshop Lightroom 4 or 5
- Apple Aperture 3.4 or higher
